name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Image Converter / Convert img to jpg png icon

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert images between multiple formats like JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP and Icon effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Converter by GPTBLOX is your ultimate tool for quick and efficient image format conversion right in your browser. The extension can handle multiple image formats like JPG, PNG, ICON, and more. It allows you to upload multiple images at once, providing a real-time preview of each image uploaded. The intuitive user interface includes placeholders for width and height, making it easy for you to resize images during conversion. Additionally, the extension offers a progress bar, giving you complete transparency during the conversion process.

Key Features:
• Supports multiple image formats: JPG, PNG, ICON, GIF, BMP, WEBP.
• Bulk upload option: Convert multiple images in one go.
• Custom Dimensions: Resize images by specifying custom dimensions.
• Real-time preview: Preview images before conversion.
• Progress Bar: Keep track of your conversion with real-time progress.
• Download as ZIP: Receive all your converted images in a zip file for convenient download.

Whether you are a designer needing different image formats or just someone looking to convert holiday photos, Image Converter has got you covered.
